properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (FolderPath endswith "\\xwizard.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "xwizard.exe") and (not((FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32\\" or FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\")))

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects the execution of Xwizard tool from a non-default directory.
When executed from a non-default directory, this utility can be abused in order to side load a custom version of "xwizards.dll".
